| History                 = T.I.M.E. was a secret [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] splinter branch created with the objective of dealing with timestream-related threats. [[Age of Ultron Vol 1 10|When the space-time continuum was broken]], T.I.M.E. found itself with a group of time-traveler opportunists called the Chronarchists attempting to modify the history for their benefit. With the help of the [[Artur Zarrko (Earth-6297)|Tomorrow Man]], T.I.M.E. sent the [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]] in a mission through time and space in order to stop them.{{r|Indestructible Hulk Vol 1 11}}
